title: What is the population of ??
query: SELECT ?entity ?entityLabel ?answerLabel WHERE { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q3624078; wdt:P1082 ?answerLabel. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } }

title: What is the currency of ??
query: SELECT ?entity ?entityLabel ?answer ?answerLabel WHERE { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q3624078; wdt:P38 ?answer. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". } }

title: What is the capital of ??
query: SELECT ?entity ?entityLabel ?answer ?answerLabel WHERE { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q3624078; wdt:P36 ?answer. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }}

title: What is the area of  ??
query: SELECT ?entity ?entityLabel ?answer ?answerLabel WHERE { ?entity wdt:P31 wd:Q3624078; wdt:P2046 ?answer. SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE],en". }}
